Title: Requires that all metropolitan transit authority buses, excluding express buses, are fare-free
Summary: Directs the metropolitan transit authority to establish and implement a no fare pilot program for transportation on all authority buses, excluding express buses, for all individuals.
LawCode: Amd ยง1266, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring that all metropolitan transit authority buses, excluding express buses, are fare-free; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
